snippet: A House Republican has introduced a measure to put Indiana’s ban on gay marriage in the state Constitution.
abstract: Indiana Republican state Rep Eric Turner introduces measure to put Indiana’s ban on gay marriage in the state Constitution.
lead_paragraph: A House Republican has introduced a measure to put Indiana’s ban on gay marriage in the state Constitution.

headline.main: Indiana: Measure Seeks to Put Gay-Marriage Ban in Constitution
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Measure Seeks To Put Gay-Marriage Ban In Constitution
